infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: MathScan AI accesses your photo library to let you select existing photos of math problems, equations, worksheets, or textbook pages for analysis.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MathScan AI uses your camera to capture photos of handwritten or printed math problems and analyze them step-by-step.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MathScan AI uses your microphone for voice input when describing math problems.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: MathScan AI saves solved math problems and step-by-step solutions to your photo library.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for math analysis.

plugins.cameraPermission: MathScan AI uses your camera to scan math problems.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow MathScan AI to access your microphone

plugins.photosPermission: MathScan AI accesses your photo library to select math problems.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: MathScan AI saves solved math problems to your library.
